name: Pillow Fight VR
description:
Want an action-packed yet relaxing game involving pillows and explosions?

In Pillow Fight VR you can grab pillows and throw them at the incoming plushies to kill them while creating beautiful explosions. But be careful, as pillows can only be used once before exploding. And if you take to long to kill all the plushies, watch out for falling stuffed animals that can kill you on impact!

This game was created for the 2022 VR Game Jam hosted by Justin P Barnett and other big VR development content creators: https://itch.io/jam/vrjam2022

Don't forget to try the bonus level! It's my favorite :)

Thanks for playing and have fun!

Tanner
